advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

cn.description:
拍摄模式

- 单次拍摄 
- 低速快门模式
- 人像
- 3D 照片
- 防抖功能
- 连拍模式
- 自拍计时器 
- 拍摄间隔时间 
- 大尺寸快门按钮 
- 视频模式 
- 4K Ultra HD 视频模式 - 3840x2160
- 4K Max 视频模式 - 4032x2268 - 应用内购买
- 慢动作视频模式
- 延时摄影 
- 4K Ultra HD 延时摄影 - 3840x2160 
- 4K Max 延时摄影 - 4032x2268 - 应用内购买 

相机功能

- 手动对焦，曝光，快门速度，ISO 和白平衡控制
- 全方位对焦和曝光控制（触摸对焦 / 触摸曝光） 
- 对焦、曝光与白平衡 (WB) 锁定 
- 可调节的长宽比（4:3 / 3:2 / 16:9 / 1:1） 
- 无损的 TIFF 格式 - 仅适用于 iPhone 4S 及更高版本
- 提供四种快门速度选择 (1/8 sec / 1/4 sec / 1/2 sec / 1 sec) 
- 视频暂停/恢复功能 
- 可调节的视频分辨率（全高清：1080p / 高清：720p / VGA：640x480 / 低品质：480x360) 
- 录制视频的同时拍摄静态照片的功能 
- 实时视频图像稳定系统（可开启或关闭） 
- 视频磁盘空间计数器 
- 延时摄影视频分辨率（全高清：1080p / 高清：720p / VGA：640x480 / 低品质：480x360) 
- 真正的慢动作视频模式，4 种播放速度（最大 fps / 30 fps / 24 fps / 15 fps)
- 6 倍数码变焦 
- 视频缩放 
- 音量计 ( 级别 平均 / 峰值) 
- 地理位置标记 
- 对齐网格（三等分 / Trisec / 黄金分割线 / 地平线) 
- 支持前 / 后置摄像头 
- 日期戳 
- 时间戳 
- 位置戳 
- 版权戳 
- 视频日期戳 
- 视频位置戳 
- 视频版权戳 
- 延时摄影日期戳 
- 延时摄影位置戳 
- 延时摄影版权戳 
- 音乐嵌入至延时摄影视频中 
- 闪光灯设置（自动 / 开启 / 关闭 / 常亮照明） 

照片 / 视频编辑器

- 非破坏性编辑——所有的编辑操作，包括裁剪，是完全可以修正 / 还原的
- 60个专业制作的过滤器
- 17 种实时镜头: 晕影 / 白晕影 / 鱼眼 / 移轴 / 宏观 / 小星球 / 虫洞 / 分割 / 万花筒 I, II, III, IV, V / 涟漪 / 条纹 / 阴影 / 半色调 
- 19 种综合调整工具
- 剪裁、修剪、旋转、镜像、拉伸和透视校正
- 您可以使用高精度的时间线逐帧查看视频 
- 将音乐歌曲添加到您的视频的功能
- 可对原始录音和背景音乐进行音量控制
- 可从视频中提取静止帧
- 支持4K (3840x2160) 高清视频格式

批量照片动作

- 批量盖章： 添加日期/时间/地点/版权印章到你相簿中的多张照片
- 批量调整大小：调整你相簿中多张照片的大小

反馈

遇到问题？对后续更新有意见或建议？请发邮件至 support@procamapp.com 与我们取得联系、

- NEW: HOME EXPERIENCE

Uncover the presence of Ozhin within your home. Prepare yourself for an eerie encounter as supernatural occurrences come to life.

This experience utilises HomeKit to interact with your home devices. This feature is only available to users with HomeKit accessories. Please note that this experience includes rapid and random flashing of lights, which may not be suitable for individuals with epilepsy or those prone to seizures. If you have epilepsy or are sensitive to intense light patterns, please exercise caution or refrain from using this feature to avoid any potential risks.

You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. User shall accept the terms of his or her fate. hk.description:
傳奇遊戲製作人小島秀夫帶來顛覆傳統的遊戲體驗，在這無可比擬的《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》中加以擴展。 
 
在未來，一場名為「死亡擱淺」的神秘事件，開啟了生死兩界間的大門，彼世的生物在殘破不堪、關係疏離的末日世界四處遊蕩。 
 
玩家扮演山姆·布橋斯，一肩扛起責任，在面目全非的美國聯繫僅餘的倖存者，為人類社會帶來希望。 
你能一步步重新聯繫這個分崩離析的世界嗎？ 
 
《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》Mac 版充分運用如 MetalFX Upscaling 等 Metal 3 功能，帶來無與倫比的精細畫質與驚人的效能。此外還包含高幀率的拍照模式，以及與 Valve Corporation 的《HALF-LIFE》系列和 CD Projekt Red 的 《電馭叛客 2077》的聯動內容。使用 Social Strand System™ 與全球玩家保持連繫。

Mac 與 iOS
• 如欲遊玩此產品，需登入 iCloud 並啟動 iCloudDrive。
• 此產品可離線遊玩，但若想完整體驗 Social Strand System™ 的功能，則必須使用網路連線。線上遊玩時會產生電信費用。

iOS 版專屬說明
• 首次遊玩此產品時，您需下載額外資料。下載約 13 GB 的遊戲內容後即可開始遊玩，但隨著遊戲進行將持續下載額外遊戲內容，總共需下載約 50 GB 的資料。如欲使用多種語言的語音資料，需下載額外內容。

FAQs
https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

- 調整了怪獸平衡，並準備新的怪獸與技能。
- 修復了各種錯誤。
hk.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

mo.description:
傳奇遊戲製作人小島秀夫帶來顛覆傳統的遊戲體驗，在這無可比擬的《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》中加以擴展。 
 
在未來，一場名為「死亡擱淺」的神秘事件，開啟了生死兩界間的大門，彼世的生物在殘破不堪、關係疏離的末日世界四處遊蕩。 
 
玩家扮演山姆·布橋斯，一肩扛起責任，在面目全非的美國聯繫僅餘的倖存者，為人類社會帶來希望。 
你能一步步重新聯繫這個分崩離析的世界嗎？ 
 
《死亡擱淺導演剪輯版》Mac 版充分運用如 MetalFX Upscaling 等 Metal 3 功能，帶來無與倫比的精細畫質與驚人的效能。此外還包含高幀率的拍照模式，以及與 Valve Corporation 的《HALF-LIFE》系列和 CD Projekt Red 的 《電馭叛客 2077》的聯動內容。使用 Social Strand System™ 與全球玩家保持連繫。

Mac 與 iOS
• 如欲遊玩此產品，需登入 iCloud 並啟動 iCloudDrive。
• 此產品可離線遊玩，但若想完整體驗 Social Strand System™ 的功能，則必須使用網路連線。線上遊玩時會產生電信費用。

iOS 版專屬說明
• 首次遊玩此產品時，您需下載額外資料。下載約 13 GB 的遊戲內容後即可開始遊玩，但隨著遊戲進行將持續下載額外遊戲內容，總共需下載約 50 GB 的資料。如欲使用多種語言的語音資料，需下載額外內容。

FAQs
https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.releaseNotes:
- 調整了怪獸平衡，並準備新的怪獸與技能。
- 修復了各種錯誤。
mo.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/

https://www.zigzagame.com/Privacy-Policy/

专门为关注自恋型人格障碍（Narcissistic Personality Disorder, NPD）的用户提供全面的认知、评估、应对和支持服务。应用基于权威心理学研究和临床实践经验，旨在帮助用户更好地理解NPD，学习有效的应对策略，并获得必要的专业支持。
Medical Disclaimer: The information in this app is provided for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
免责声明：本应用提供的内容仅供教育和参考之用，不能替代专业医生的诊断或治疗建议。如有任何健康问题，请务必在使用本应用的内容前咨询医生或其他有资质的医疗服务人员。

us.description:
Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History
· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024
· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of
· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies
· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse 

Official MLB & KBO Licenses
· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase
· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters

Create Your Perfect Team
· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world
· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users
· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available
· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team

New This Year
· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more
· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation
· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale
· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation
· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about
· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play.
· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go"
· And more!


OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. 

Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball.

Officially Licensed Product – MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE®

Out of the Park Developments © Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

SHOOTING MODES

VIDEO FRAME RATES AND RESOLUTIONS

* 96 / 100 / 120 fps 1080p - iPhone 6s / Plus and later
* 192 / 200 / 240 fps 1080p - iPhone 8 and later 
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K - iPhone 8 and later  

TIME LAPSE FRAME RATES AND RESOLUTIONS

- VGA, 720p, 1080p

- 4K Ultra HD - 3840x2160 - native support on iPhone 6s / Plus and later

* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 1080p - all devices
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K - iPhone 5 / iPad Air 2 and later
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K Max -  iPhone 6s / Plus and later

MANUAL CONTROLS

- Manual exposure, shutter speed, ISO, focus, and white balance controls
- Scroll and steppers system inspired by DSLR cameras
- Tap location accurate manual focus assist
- True focus peaking
- Zebra stripes - overexposure warning
- Live shutter speed, ISO, focus, and WB values

MAIN CAMERA FEATURES

PHOTO / VIDEO EDITOR & PHOTO EDITING EXTENSION

- 17 lenses: Vignette / White Vignette / Fisheye / Tilt Shift / Macro / Tiny Planet / Wormhole / Split / Kaleidoscope I, II, III, IV, V / Ripple / Striped / Hatched / Halftone
- 19 comprehensive adjustment tools
- Trimming, cropping, rotating, mirroring, straightening, and perspective correction
- Extremely accurate timeline with the ability to review videos frame by frame
- Ability to add background music

tr.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

Apple’s App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world’s most trusted digital journal. 

“Day One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.” – New York Times

“Day One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.” – Wired

“This superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.” – Macworld

WHY DAY ONE?

Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. 

SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE

• Beautiful, award-winning design
• Unlimited text entries 
• Unlimited photos and videos*
• Powerful rich text formatting with markdown
• Different journals for every aspect of your life*

PRIVATE AND SECURE 

• Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
• End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
• Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID
• Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 

• Programmable reminder notifications
• Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer’s cramp 
• Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries
• Today view provides a summary of where you’ve been and what you’ve done

JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER

• Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac 
• The ability to email entries straight to your journal

BUILT FOR REMINISCING

• On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
• Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you’re looking for
• Map view quickly shows all the places you’ve journaled from

*Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today.

SHOOTING MODES 

- Photo
- Burst Mode
- Slow Shutter
- Portrait Mode - supported on all dual lens camera system as well as iPhone XR and iPhone SE 2020
- 3D Photo - requires dual lens camera system
- Video
- Time Lapse

PHOTO SHUTTER RELEASE OPTIONS

- Self-Timer 
- Anti-Shake
- Screen Shutter / Big Button
- Interval

VIDEO FRAME RATES AND RESOLUTIONS

- VGA, 720p, 1080p
- 4K Ultra HD - 3264x1836 upscaled to 3840x2160 - in-app purchase - iPhone 5s / iPad Air 2 and later
- 4K Ultra HD - 3840x2160 - native support on iPhone 6s / Plus and later
- 4K Max - 4032x2268 - in-app purchase -  iPhone 6s / Plus and later
- High frame rate:
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 720p - iPhone 5 / iPad mini and later  
* 96 / 100 /120 fps 720p - iPhone 5s / iPad Air 2 and later 
* 192 / 200 / 240 fps 720p - iPhone 6 and later 
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 1080p - iPhone 6 and later
* 96 / 100 / 120 fps 1080p - iPhone 6s / Plus and later
* 192 / 200 / 240 fps 1080p - iPhone 8 and later 
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K - iPhone 8 and later  

TIME LAPSE FRAME RATES AND RESOLUTIONS

- VGA, 720p, 1080p
- 4K Ultra HD - 3264x1836 upscaled to 3840x2160 - in-app purchase - iPhone 5 / iPad Air 2 and later
- 4K Ultra HD - 3840x2160 - native support on iPhone 6s / Plus and later
- 4K Max - 4032x2268 - in-app purchase - iPhone 6s / Plus and later
- High frame rate:
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 720p - all devices
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 1080p - all devices
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K - iPhone 5 / iPad Air 2 and later
* 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K Max -  iPhone 6s / Plus and later

MANUAL CONTROLS

- Manual exposure, shutter speed, ISO, focus, and white balance controls
- Scroll and steppers system inspired by DSLR cameras
- Tap location accurate manual focus assist
- True focus peaking
- Zebra stripes - overexposure warning
- Live shutter speed, ISO, focus, and WB values
- Manual controls are supported in all photo and video modes

MAIN CAMERA FEATURES

- RAW (DNG) iOS 10 - iPhone 6s / iPad Pro 9.7 and later
- Lossless TIFF file format support
- Intelligent 3-shot HDR
- AEB (Auto Exposure Bracketing) with RAW support for high contrast conditions
- Live light level histogram
- Adjustable aspect ratio (4:3 / 3:2 / 16:9 / 1:1) 
- Video pause/resume functionality 
- Video audio meter (Avg. / Peak signal levels) 
- Still photo capture during video recording 
- Realtime video stabilization (ON/OFF) 
- Video disk space indicator 
- Thirds grid and horizontal tiltmeter. 
- Date / time / location / Copyright stamp

PHOTO / VIDEO EDITOR & PHOTO EDITING EXTENSION

- Nondestructive editing - all edits, including cropping, are completely amendable / reversible 
- 60 expertly crafted filters
- 17 lenses: Vignette / White Vignette / Fisheye / Tilt Shift / Macro / Tiny Planet / Wormhole / Split / Kaleidoscope I, II, III, IV, V / Ripple / Striped / Hatched / Halftone
- 19 comprehensive adjustment tools
- Trimming, cropping, rotating, mirroring, straightening, and perspective correction
- Extremely accurate timeline with the ability to review videos frame by frame
- Ability to add background music
